thread.section_title: Outsource Data Recovery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Outsource Data Recovery | outsourcedatarecovery.com
thread.title: Ken R.
thread.title_full: Outsource Data Recovery reviewed by Ken R.

author: Ken R.
title: Ken R.
text:
At first I felt a little nervous about sending the external drive to strangers.
After they received it and contacted me as to the repair and recovery of
all the data, I was completely satisfied with the care and cost. Got the
drive back and was able to transfer all the data back to the computer.
Job WELL DONE, thanks.
